p: As explained above, based on (B1), the conclusion cannot be stronger. Thus, to be safe, we stay with the conclusion based on (B2). This conclusion is not a statement of the obvious. Longer colony duration in the Mediterranean (although based on data from different years) is an unexpected result, based on a large amount of data. So our data do not support the idea that shorter colony duration is the reason for the paucity of Harmonia in the Mediterranean, as colony duration was not shorter there.
